nevada 0.1.0

Coercion to Network-Valued Data Object

Source: R/nvd-class.R
as_nvd.Rd

This function flags a list of igraph objects as an nvd object as defined in this package.

as_nvd(obj)

Arguments

obj

A list of igraph objects.

Value

An nvd object.

Examples

as_nvd(nvd("smallworld", 10))

#> [[1]]
#> IGRAPH 2a3d31a U--- 25 100 -- Watts-Strogatz random graph
#> + attr: name (g/c), dim (g/n), size (g/n), nei (g/n), p (g/n), loops
